name: Agent Chong Wick
description:
Trailer: Quick Info:

An action-packed 2D platformer shooter about an agent uncovering a conspiracy.

Description:

An action-packed 2D platformer shooter about a Malaysian secret agent undergoing missions to uncover the conspiracies of the largest corrupt company, 2B2T. As he went on more missions, he finds out 2B2T is something more villainous than just a corrupt company…

The game has simple controls, but tight timings and requires good hand-eye coordination, intended for experienced platformer and shooter players.

Our Team:

Team Nasi Gorengggg was founded for a school project, namely “Game Project Studio 1”. We are a group of aspiring game developers hoping to gain experience from this invaluable lesson of working as a team. The team includes 9 people and all of them are talented and amazing people. We hope to do the best for our first game project.
